mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, A.* from (select * from income order by income_date desc) A where rownum<=#{endRow}) where rnum>=#{startRow}
mapper.insert: insert into income values ( #{auction_code}, #{income}, sysdate, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_address}, #{receiver_phone}, null )
mapper.select: select count(*) from Income where auction_code=#{auction_code}
